member.name: T:Sitecore.Framework.Messaging.Rebus.SqlServer.DataBus.SchemaInstaller
member.summary: Provides simple utility methods for installing Rebus SQLServer DataBus schema.

member.summary: Configures Rebus to use SQL Server as its transport. The table specified by will be used to store messages, and the "queue" specified by will be used when querying for messages. The message table will automatically be created if it does not exist.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Framework.Messaging.Rebus.SqlServer.Transport.SqlServerBatchTransportConfigurationExtensions.UseSqlServerBatchTransport(Rebus.Config.StandardConfigurer{Sitecore.Framework.Messaging.Rebus.Gateway.IBatchTransport},System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Configures Rebus to use SQL Server as its transport. The table specified by will be used to store messages, and the "queue" specified by will be used when querying for messages. The message table will automatically be created if it does not exist.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Framework.Messaging.Rebus.Configuration.RebusConfigurationServicesExtensions.AddSqlServerConfigurators(Sitecore.Framework.Messaging.Rebus.Configuration.RebusConfigurationServices)
member.summary: Registers support for reading configuration for Azure specific implementations (i.e. Azure Service Bus transport).

members.member: Configures Rebus to use SQL Server as its transport. The "queue" specified by will be used when querying for messages. The table specified by will be used to store messages. s

member.name: M:Sitecore.Framework.Messaging.Rebus.Configuration.SqlServerTransportConfigurationExtensions.UseSqlServer(Rebus.Config.StandardConfigurer{Rebus.Transport.ITransport},System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Func{Sitecore.Framework.TransientFaultHandling.IRetryer})
member.summary: Configures Rebus to use SQL Server as its transport. The "queue" specified by will be used when querying for messages. The table specified by will be used to store messages.
Configures Rebus to use SQL Server to transport messages as a one-way client (i.e. will not be able to receive any messages). The table specified by will be used to store messages.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Framework.Messaging.Rebus.Configuration.SqlServerTransportConfigurationExtensions.UseSqlServerAsOneWayClient(Rebus.Config.StandardConfigurer{Rebus.Transport.ITransport},System.String,System.String,System.Func{Sitecore.Framework.TransientFaultHandling.IRetryer})
member.summary: Configures Rebus to use SQL Server to transport messages as a one-way client (i.e. will not be able to receive any messages). The table specified by will be used to store messages.
